name: airflow-8.9.0
body: [](https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/releases/tag/airflow-8.9.0) ## Description The `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` is the standard way to deploy [Apache Airflow](https://airflow.apache.org/) on [Kubernetes](https://kubernetes.io/) with [Helm](https://helm.sh/). Originally created in 2017, it has since helped thousands of companies create production-ready deployments of Airflow on Kubernetes. > If you appreciate the `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` please consider supporting us! > > > > > > > ## Changelog - [__Full Changelog__](https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/blob/main/charts/airflow/CHANGELOG.md#890---2024-04-30) ## What's Changed * docs: fix okta oauth example for airflow 2.3.3+ by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/803 * ci: update github actions by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/850 * feat: update pgbouncer image to 1.22.1 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/851 * feat: update postgresql image to 11.22 & alpine 3.19 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/852 * feat: add `topologySpreadConstraints` values by @ron-damon in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/752 * feat: add optional `rbac.secrets` value to give GET/LIST/WATCH on Secrets by @ashokkumar-srinivas in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/790 * feat: add `airflow.defaultContainerSecurityContext` value by @zartstrom in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/624 * feat: add `pgbouncer.statsUsers` value to set `stats_user` in pgbouncer by @jbvaningen in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/820 * fix: set `appProtocol` on Service ports (for Istio) by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/854 * feat: add values to set init-container resources by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/855 * feat: add `extraContainers` and `extraInitContainers` values for all components by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/856 * fix: scheduler and triggerer probe performance for airflow <2.6.0 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/853 * fix: don't import User and Role FAB models, fixes airflow 2.9.0+ by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/857 * fix: `extraPipPackages` values for airflow 2.9.0+ by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/858 * chore: release 8.9.0 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/859 ## New Contributors * @ron-damon made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/752 * @ashokkumar-srinivas made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/790 * @zartstrom made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/624 * @jbvaningen made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/820 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/compare/airflow-8.8.0...airflow-8.9.0

name: airflow-8.8.0
body: [](https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/releases/tag/airflow-8.8.0) ## Description The `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` is the standard way to deploy [Apache Airflow](https://airflow.apache.org/) on [Kubernetes](https://kubernetes.io/) with [Helm](https://helm.sh/). Originally created in 2017, it has since helped thousands of companies create production-ready deployments of Airflow on Kubernetes. > If you appreciate the `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` please consider supporting us! > > > > > > > ## Changelog - https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/blob/main/charts/airflow/CHANGELOG.md#880---2023-08-28 ## What's Changed * fix: invalid pgbouncer-certs volume spec when empty by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/777 * feat: support `include_deferred` in pool sync for airflow 2.7.0 by @EinavDanielDX in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/775 * fix: sync-users for airflow 2.7.0 by @SamWheating in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/772 * feat: add liveness probe for celery workers by @nickwood in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/766 * chore: release 8.8.0 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/778 ## New Contributors * @EinavDanielDX made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/775 * @SamWheating made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/772 * @nickwood made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/766 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/compare/airflow-8.7.1...airflow-8.8.0

name: airflow-8.7.1
body: [](https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/releases/tag/airflow-8.7.1) ## Description The `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` is the standard way to deploy [Apache Airflow](https://airflow.apache.org/) on [Kubernetes](https://kubernetes.io/) with [Helm](https://helm.sh/). Originally created in 2017, it has since helped thousands of companies create production-ready deployments of Airflow on Kubernetes. > If you appreciate the `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` please consider supporting us! > > > > > > > ## Changelog - https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/blob/main/charts/airflow/CHANGELOG.md#871---2023-05-13 ## What's Changed * docs: fix typo for "wasb" by @obeyda in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/726 * fix: liveness probes in airflow 2.6.0 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/743 * docs: fix external secrets website links by @seunggabi in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/733 * chore: release 8.7.1 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/744 ## New Contributors * @obeyda made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/726 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/compare/airflow-8.7.0...airflow-8.7.1

name: airflow-8.7.0
body: [](https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/releases/tag/airflow-8.7.0) ## Description The `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` is the standard way to deploy [Apache Airflow](https://airflow.apache.org/) on [Kubernetes](https://kubernetes.io/) with [Helm](https://helm.sh/). Originally created in 2018, it has since helped thousands of companies create production-ready deployments of Airflow on Kubernetes. > If you appreciate the `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` please consider supporting us! > > > > > > > ## Changelog - https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/blob/main/charts/airflow/CHANGELOG.md#870---2023-04-06 ## What's Changed * docs: fix relative link anchors to readme by @marekhanus in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/693 * docs: add `2.4` to supported versions by @jooonhoe in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/700 * feat: release pgbouncer 1.18.0 image by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/714 * feat: add openssl to pgbouncer image by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/717 * feat: update apiVersion for `PodDisruptionBudget` and `HorizontalPodAutoscaler` by @karakanb in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/685 * feat: allow disabling chart-managed `webserver_config.py` by @mb-m in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/631 * fix: typo in error message by @marekhanus in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/696 * feat: add `dags.gitSync.submodules` value by @karakanb in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/620 * feat: allow changing pool slots on cron schedules by @DanielMorales9 in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/649 * feat: generate self-signed pgbouncer certs with script by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/718 * fix: also set `kubernetes_executor` airflow configs by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/719 * chore: release 8.7.0 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/720 ## New Contributors * @marekhanus made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/693 * @jooonhoe made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/700 * @mb-m made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/631 * @DanielMorales9 made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/649 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/compare/airflow-8.6.1...airflow-8.7.0

name: airflow-8.6.1
body: ## Description The `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` is the standard way to deploy [Apache Airflow](https://airflow.apache.org/) on [Kubernetes](https://kubernetes.io/) with [Helm](https://helm.sh/). Originally created in 2018, it has since helped thousands of companies create production-ready deployments of Airflow on Kubernetes. > If you appreciate the `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` please consider supporting us! > > > > > > > ## Changelog - https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/blob/main/charts/airflow/CHANGELOG.md#861---2022-06-22 ## What's Changed * feat: initial postgresql-bitnami image (with ARM) by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/606 * feat: add `airflow.protectedPipPackages` by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/610 * fix: pgbouncer liveness probe in minikube by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/560 * fix: set AIRFLOW__LOGGING__WORKER_LOG_SERVER_PORT by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/608 * fix: only set SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URI in airflow 1.10 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/609 * fix: require release-name to have <= 40 characters by @seunggabi in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/589 * fix: some breaking changes from airflow 2.3.0 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/592 * fix: wait-for-db-migrations in airflow 2.3.0 by @maxsteele-shelf in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/576 * fix: use rsync for extraPipPackages by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/599 * chore: update .helmignore to exclude docs by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/593 * feat: allow using extraVolumeMounts for log storage by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/585 * feat: minimum scheduler age before task-creation-check by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/612 * chore: release 8.6.1 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/616 ## New Contributors * @seunggabi made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/589 * @maxsteele-shelf made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/576 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/compare/airflow-8.6.0...airflow-8.6.1

name: airflow-8.6.0
body: ## Description The `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` is the standard way to deploy [Apache Airflow](https://airflow.apache.org/) on [Kubernetes](https://kubernetes.io/) with [Helm](https://helm.sh/). Originally created in 2018, it has since helped thousands of companies create production-ready deployments of Airflow on Kubernetes. > If you appreciate the `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` please consider supporting us! > > > > > > > ## Changelog - https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/blob/main/charts/airflow/CHANGELOG.md#860---2022-04-13 ## What's Changed * feat: update pgbouncer to 1.17.0 & build for linux/arm64 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/551 * feat: add log-cleanup sidecar to scheduler/worker by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/554 * feat: update pgbouncer image tag `1.17.0-patch.0` by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/552 * fix: set `DUMB_INIT_SETSID=0` for celery workers (warm shutdown) by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/550 * feat: allow `airflow.users[].roles` to specify a list of roles by @kmehkeri in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/539 * feat: database passwords with values + username from secret by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/553 * fix: `pgbouncer.livenessProbe.enabled` not being respected by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/546 * feat: add "task creation check" to scheduler liveness probe by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/549 * fix: replace pgbouncer readinessProbe with startupProbe by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/547 * feat: set default `pgbouncer.maxClientConnections` to 1000 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/543 * fix: update default `dags.gitSync.image.tag` to v3.5.0 by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/544 * feat: add `airflow.kubernetesPodTemplate.podLabels` value by @aodj in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/534 * fix: only set `CONNECTION_CHECK_MAX_COUNT` once by @bitsofdave in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/533 * feat: add `airflow.kubernetesPodTemplate.shareProcessNamespace` value by @mthoretton in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/408 * feat: add `airflow.kubernetesPodTemplate.extraInitContainers` by @jmcgrath207 in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/446 * feat: add `airflow.clusterDomain` value by @alexkasatikov in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/441 * fix: `airflow.{fernetKey,webserverSecretKey}` overshadow `_CMD` configs by @aodj in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/508 * fix: allow ingress `servicePort` to be string or number by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/530 * fix: PG_ADVISORY_LOCK are not released in pgbouncer by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/529 * feat: add `airflow.kubernetesPodTemplate.extraContainers` by @jonashartwig in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/456 * feat: fully support helm templating in `extraManifests` by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/523 * feat: add `ingressClassName` value to ingress by @fkoetzner in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/527 * feat: allow labels on `sync` and `db-migrations` Deployments/Jobs by @oleksandrkovalenko in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/467 * feat: add `pgbouncer.authType` value by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/498 * feat: add `airflow triggerer` Deployment by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/555 * fix: cast user values with toString before b64enc by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/557 * chore: release `8.6.0` by @thesuperzapper in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/559 ## New Contributors * @kmehkeri made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/539 * @aodj made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/534 * @bitsofdave made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/533 * @jmcgrath207 made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/446 * @alexkasatikov made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/441 * @jonashartwig made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/456 * @fkoetzner made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/527 * @oleksandrkovalenko made their first contribution in https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/pull/467 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/compare/airflow-8.5.3...airflow-8.6.0

name: airflow-8.5.3

name: airflow-8.0.1
body: ## Description The `User-Community Airflow Helm Chart` is the standard way to deploy [Apache Airflow](https://airflow.apache.org/) on [Kubernetes](https://kubernetes.io/) with [Helm](https://helm.sh/). Originally created in 2018, it has since helped thousands of companies create production-ready deployments of Airflow on Kubernetes. ## Changelog - https://github.com/airflow-helm/charts/blob/main/charts/airflow/CHANGELOG.md#801---2021-03-27
